participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: A cheerful and curious individual who loves to explore new tastes and experiences.
participant_1.background: Emma grew up in a multicultural environment, which has greatly influenced her love for diverse cuisines.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: An adventurous and laid-back person who enjoys trying new dishes and sharing food adventures with friends.
participant_2.background: Liam has a passion for cooking and often experiments with recipes from around the world.
